snippet: Usain Bolt recovered from a poor start to win the 100 meters in 9.79 seconds Thursday, finishing 0.06 seconds ahead of Asafa Powell at a Diamond League meet in Oslo.
abstract: Usain Bolt wins 100 meters in 9.79 seconds, finishing .06 seconds ahead of Asafa Powell at Diamond League meet in Oslo.
lead_paragraph: Usain Bolt recovered from a poor start to win the 100 meters in 9.79 seconds Thursday, finishing 0.06 seconds ahead of Asafa Powell at a Diamond League meet in Oslo.
